main event: An unidentified flying object was seen frequently over the cities of Clifton, Paterson and Hawthorne, New Jersey on September 20, 21, 22 and 24, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed ascending and around Hawthorne.
On September 23, a Mrs. Lee and her son in Hawthorne, N.J. saw an object moving at a fantastic speed.
On September 24, two Hawthorne policemen sighted an object similar to the one described.
On September 15, 1962, two patrolmen of Hawthorne Police Department saw two strange 'gigantic' lights in the sky that hovered over the area, then moved and disappeared over the ocean.
On September 6, a man in Lebanon, R.I. observed a disc-shaped object hovering over his home, illuminating the area with a bluish-green light.
sighted object: circular object, disc-shaped object, and 'gigantic' lights in the sky
location: Clifton, Paterson, Hawthorne (New Jersey), Lebanon (Rhode Island)
witnesses: citizens, Mrs. Lee and her son, two Hawthorne policemen, William Evans
